attributes.action: introduce a system of secret ballot voting in the Houses of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to improve the representation of the people in Parliament the petitioner seeks the introduction of Secret Ballot Voting in the course Parliamentary debates thereby abolishing susceptibility to scrutiny of Members Voting in the present lobby system. This measure would enhance  representative democracy in Britain, requiring that Bills would need to stand on their merits rather than on the actions of Whips.
